26#include "includes.h"
27#ifdef USE_PAM
28
29struct ssh;
30
31void start_pam(struct ssh *);
32void finish_pam(void);
33u_int do_pam_account(void);
34void do_pam_session(struct ssh *);
35void do_pam_setcred(int );
36void do_pam_chauthtok(void);
37int do_pam_putenv(const char *, char *);
38char ** fetch_pam_environment(void);
39char ** fetch_pam_child_environment(void);
40void free_pam_environment(char **);
41void sshpam_thread_cleanup(void);
42void sshpam_cleanup(void);
43int sshpam_auth_passwd(Authctxt *, const char *);
44int sshpam_get_maxtries_reached(void);
45void sshpam_set_maxtries_reached(int);
46int is_pam_session_open(void);
47
48#endif /* USE_PAM */
